mapper.select: /* 대국민포털_역할기본 조회 (RoleMapper.getRole) */ SELECT role_cd ,role_nm ,role_type ,role_expln_cn ,use_yn ,wrtr_dept_nm ,mdfr_dept_nm ,rgtr_id ,reg_dt ,reg_prgrm_id ,mdfr_id ,mdfcn_dt ,mdfcn_prgrm_id FROM "KIDS_OWN"."TB_PP_M_ROLE" WHERE 1=1 AND role_cd = #{roleCd}
mapper.update: /* 대국민포털_역할기본 수정 (RoleMapper.updateRole) */ UPDATE "KIDS_OWN"."TB_PP_M_ROLE" SET role_nm = coalesce(#{roleNm}, role_nm) ,role_type = coalesce(#{roleType}, role_type) ,role_expln_cn = coalesce(#{roleExplnCn}, role_expln_cn) ,use_yn = coalesce(#{useYn}, use_yn) ,wrtr_dept_nm = coalesce(#{wrtrDeptNm}, wrtr_dept_nm) ,mdfr_dept_nm = coalesce(#{mdfrDeptNm}, mdfr_dept_nm) ,mdfr_id = coalesce(#{mdfrId}, mdfr_id) ,mdfcn_dt = now() ,mdfcn_prgrm_id = coalesce(#{mdfcnPrgrmId}, mdfcn_prgrm_id) WHERE 1=1 AND role_cd = #{roleCd}
